name: Mattress
description: 80yo Male dialysis patient with leg weakness looking for a light weight single bed mattress (preferably 3 inch thick). The current mattress is old, dirty and bulky, client has difficulty changing bed sheet by himself.

contact.org: NTUC Health Cluster Support @ Bukit Merah
contact.name: Jordan Kek

passiton.description: this can be put ontop of existing mattress to avoid bed sores

passiton.description: Well maintained. Height of bed is adjustable. Comes with remote control. Without serving tray.
passiton.location: Bayshore, Bedok, Chai Chee, Eastwood, Kew Drive, Upper East Coast

passiton.name: Hospital Bed with Air Pressure Mattress
passiton.description: A single electric nursing bed for donation with an air pressure mattress. We plan to give these items together, along with all relevant accessories. Do note that there is some wear on the wiring but item is otherwise in good working condition.

name: Baby Cot
description:
client, in her 30’s has 3 young children ,age 6, 3 and 1. She is the only caregiver for the children. Family live in a public rental unit, has no means to purchase big ticket items. 

She is requesting for a baby cot for the youngest. The child used to have a shorter baby cot but he fell. Hope the new(higher) baby cot can help to relieve some of mother’s caregiving tasks ie he can be placed in the cot safely then she can attend to other chores in the household.

passiton.name: Baby Spring Cot
passiton.description: Used item by previous tenant. Have to assemble from parts with light screwing. Sarong cloth will need washed and dried before donating. Self collection preferred (negotiable).

name: Baby Cot
description: Client is currently pregnant with triplets and is due to give birth in July. She has 4 other young children and together with her husband, the family of 6 is sustaining on husband’s income as a delivery rider. With the upcoming birth of the triplets, there are foreseeable increasing financial challenges for the family in meeting their needs adequately. The family is looking for a baby cot for the triplets and will benefit from donations to alleviate the financial costs. Interested donors kindly contact social worker Theresa at 6365 8751

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Admiralty
contact.name: Lei Hui Yun

passiton.name: Baby Spring Cot
passiton.description: Used item by previous tenant. Have to assemble from parts with light screwing. Sarong cloth will need washed and dried before donating. Self collection preferred (negotiable).

name: Rice cooker
description:
Please contact Silas - 92353273
silas.tan@montfortcare.org.sg

Ct is a low income 70YO lady living with her 79 YO husband. The appliances in their home are worn out as they are unable to afford new appliances. Her husband is also fearful to part with their old appliances for fear of going without. Their current rice cooker is 20YO and unusable. They would benefit from a rice cooker so that they don't need to eat instant noodles.

passiton.name: Philips Rice Cooker
passiton.description: 5 year old Rice cooker, still works well.
passiton.location: Amber Road, East Coast, Joo Chiat, Katong, Marine Parade, Meyer, Tanjong Rhu
